title: Remove Leadership Team section and placeholder media from Gallery

requirements.text: Remove the Leadership Team section from the About page (frontend/src/pages/About.tsx)

quotes: LEADERSHIP TEAM KA NAAM HATA DEN

acceptanceCriteria: Leadership Team section is completely removed from the About page
Page layout remains clean and professional after removal
Other sections (founder info, history, mission, values) remain intact

requirements.text: Remove all placeholder photos from the Gallery page photo gallery section (frontend/src/pages/Gallery.tsx)

quotes: JO PHOTOS OR VIDEOS HAI VO MERE DWARA UPLOAD NHI HAI USE BHI HATA DE

acceptanceCriteria: All placeholder photo entries are removed from the photo gallery tab
Photo gallery section displays empty state or message indicating no photos available

requirements.text: Remove all placeholder videos from the Gallery page video gallery section (frontend/src/pages/Gallery.tsx)

quotes: JO PHOTOS OR VIDEOS HAI VO MERE DWARA UPLOAD NHI HAI USE BHI HATA DE

acceptanceCriteria: All placeholder video entries are removed from the video gallery tab
Video gallery section displays empty state or message indicating no videos available

constraints: Do not modify the Navigation component or main layout structure
Preserve the founder information section on the About page
Keep the Gallery page structure intact with tab navigation, only remove media content
nonGoals: Adding new content to replace removed sections
Restructuring the entire About or Gallery pages
Modifying the backend contact form functionality
